participant_1.background:
I'm worried that my parents will find out about my deployment.
i have a consulting firm.
I love to eat at the local diner because it is close to my house and the food is always good.
I am of a healthy weight for my height.
I have started baking for my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I love to look through my souvenirs from my travels and reminisce about my adventures.
I love playing with my cats after a long day of gigging.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
I bought a bouquet of daisies for my wife on our anniversary.
I am afraid of not being able to control my diabetes.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great! I just got back from the local diner and I'm stuffed. What was your favorite meal from your travels?
Ooh, that's a tough one! I have so many great memories of food from my travels. I think one of my favorites was the paella I had in Spain. It was so flavorful and delicious!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to try paella. Do you have any tips for cooking it?
Sure! I actually just found a great recipe online the other day. I'll send it to you if you'd like.
That would be great! Thank you!
No problem!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to play with my cats! They're so cute and cuddly. I also love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a comic con before.
You should definitely go to one! They're so much fun. You get to meet all your favorite characters and there's always something new to see.
I'll have to look into it! Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem!
So, what are you afraid of?
I'm afraid of not being able to control my diabetes. It's a chronic condition and I worry about it getting worse.
I'm sorry to hear that. I know it can be tough to deal with a chronic condition.
It is, but I'm trying to stay positive and live my life to the fullest.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be okay.
Thanks
